title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts -Marcus Thompson on Warriors Transition, Chandler Parsons on Kyrie/ Boston Beef, Mel Tucker on Saban, Harbaugh
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts -Marcus Thompson on Warriors Transition, Chandler Parsons on Kyrie/ Boston Beef, Mel Tucker on Saban, Harbaugh
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, Colin’s top takes of the week, including why the NBA Playoff ratings have been higher than normal and why Steve Ballmer would probably like a refund on Kawhi and Paul George.

Then, The Athletic NBA Writer Marcus Thompson discusses how much blame Steve Nash deserves in the Nets Game 1 loss to the Celtics, and who’s the odd man out in the Warriors big picture plans with the emergence of Jordan Poole.

Next, 9-year NBA veteran Chandler Parsons looks at if Kyrie went over the line by flipping off Boston fans, what he learned playing for Billy Donovan, and what his non-baller friends don’t appreciate about NBA players.

Finally, Michigan State Head Coach Mel discusses what Nick Saban does better than any other coach, if there is any reason to friendly with rival Jim Harbaugh, and what he immediately sold him on Kenneth Walker III.

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
